summary: French soldier travels to Germany to find a family of a man he killed during World War I.
cast: Lionel Barrymore|Nancy Carroll|Phillips Holmes|Louise Carter|Lucien Littlefield|Tom Douglas|Zasu Pitts|Frank Sheridan|George Bickel|Emma Dunn|Reinhold Pasch|Rod McLennan|George Davis|Robert Dudley|Ed Eberle|Lillian Elliott|Henry Fifer|Julia Swayne Gordon|George Irving|Kate MacKenna|Marjorie Main|Tully Marshall|Torben Meyer|Russ Powell|Joan Standing|Marvin Stephens|John Steppling|Louis Van der Ecker|Anton Vaverka|Dorothy Vernon|Paul Weigel|Lottie Williams
title: Remordimiento
